management.title: Active Subscriptions
management.noSubscriptions: You don't have any active subscriptions yet

pause.title: Pause Subscription
pause.description: Are you sure you want to pause your subscription to {creator}? You can resume it anytime.

resume.title: Resume Subscription
resume.description: Resume your subscription to {creator}? Billing will continue from the next cycle.

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription to {creator}? You'll have access until {date}.
cancel.warning: You can resubscribe anytime, but you may lose any special pricing or perks you currently have.

messages.pauseSuccess: Subscription paused successfully. You will not be billed until you resume.
messages.resumeSuccess: Subscription resumed successfully. Billing will continue normally.
messages.cancelSuccess: Subscription cancelled. You'll have access until {date}.
